project_overview.name: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)
project_overview.description: A web-based portal that improves customer onboarding, self-service, and engagement with the company's SaaS product.

feature_breakdown.description: Allow customers to securely log in using their main SaaS product credentials.
acceptance_criteria: Successful login with main SaaS credentials

feature_breakdown.description: Display a personalized onboarding checklist based on the customer's subscription level.
acceptance_criteria: Accurate checklist displayed based on subscription tier

feature_breakdown.description: Integrate with the existing knowledge base API to allow seamless content searching and viewing.
acceptance_criteria: Ability to search and view knowledge base articles

feature_breakdown.description: Display a dashboard showing the customer's adoption metrics (e.g., daily active users, feature usage count).
acceptance_criteria: Accurate and up-to-date adoption metrics displayed

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or a Zendesk ticket with customer details.
acceptance_criteria: Ability to initiate contact with CSM from the portal

technical_architecture.data_flow: User requests -> API Gateway -> Microservices -> Database/External Systems -> Response to User
security_considerations: Use TLS 1.2+ for all network communications
Conduct regular security audits and penetration testing

implementation_phases.description: Deliver the core functionality of the COSP within 6 months.
Implement additional features to enhance customer engagement and self-service.

risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Establish clear communication and collaboration with API providers, maintain contingency plans

risk_analysis.description: Scalability issues with high user concurrency
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Implement load testing, use a scalable cloud-based infrastructure, and monitor performance metrics

risk_analysis.description: Insufficient user adoption of the COSP
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Conduct user research, design a intuitive and engaging user experience, and promote the portal through various channels

infrastructure_needs: Secure VPN access for remote team members

success_metrics.target_value: Decrease by 5 percentage points within 12 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Analyze customer retention data from CRM system

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce from 30 days to 14 days within 6 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Track feature adoption data from product usage API

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce time spent on manual onboarding tasks by 25%
success_metrics.measurement_method: Monitor CSM activity and ticket data from CRM and ticketing systems

success_metrics.target_value: Increase to 40% of support questions resolved via the portal
success_metrics.measurement_method: Analyze support ticket data and portal usage metrics
